Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: The Frosty Freestyle and Krazy Klassic are ON! We just finished course inspection at 10:46am - the course is currently a wide, thick layer of hardpack and ice. Once the Power Tiller runs over it, we'll have a nice surface for racing! Registration ends at 1:00pm today for the Frosty Freestyle and 1:00pm Saturday for the Krazy Klassic.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: All loops are far better than they need to be for Wonderful Skiing !

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are open, but will not be groomed until the temperature goes below freezing.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday thru Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m.
nubsNob.comments: Some days it rains in the winter and this is one of those days. It's a sloppy start with wet snow. The rain is forecast to move out this morning and may even turn to light snow. Expect variable conditions today. The wet snow may begin to set-up in some areas if the temperature drops and will create an inconsistent snow surface. The soup of the day is Clam Chowder. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. today. Despite the small break from winter weather, make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
